name: Rover Staked Bitcoin
description: Rover is a Bitcoin Liquid Staking platform for the Spiderchain. rovbBTC is a derivative of BTC that is staked on Rover, which is a decentralized protocol allowing users to stake their BTC. Rover allows BTC holders to stake their BTC by issuing rovBTC tokens, allowing users to retain their liquidity. One of the key benefits of rovBTC is that it is liquid and can be traded and used on various decentralized exchanges and dAPPS. rovBTC can be used for trading, lending, or as collateral across DeFi applications on the Spiderchain.
